Package gobblin.config.store.hdfs

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultCapableLocalConfigStoreFactory
    A SimpleHDFSConfigStoreFactory that uses the user directory as the config store location.
    SimpleHadoopFilesystemConfigStore
    An implementation of ConfigStore backed by HDFS.
    SimpleHadoopFilesystemConfigStoreFactory
    An abstract base class for ConfigStoreFactorys based on FileSystem.
    SimpleHDFSConfigStoreFactory
    An implementation of ConfigStoreFactory for creating SimpleHadoopFilesystemConfigStores.
    SimpleHDFSStoreMetadata
    A metadata accessor for an HDFS based ConfigStore.
    SimpleLocalHDFSConfigStoreFactory
    Extension of SimpleHDFSConfigStoreFactory that creates a SimpleHadoopFilesystemConfigStore which works for the local file system.
